section_title: Good practice guidance and other information on LULUCF
sentences: The IPCC presented its relevant work, including a report on Good Practice Guidance (GPG) for LULUCF and work on factoring out direct human- induced changes in carbon stocks from indirect human-induced and natural effects, and noted difficulties in providing a practical methodology for factoring out for a broad range of LULUCF activities.
TUVALU, for AOSIS, stressed the need for consultation with national experts.
The US said the IPCC should not be engaged further in GPG as current scientific knowledge is insufficient to develop comprehensive methodologies.
Chair Thorgeirsson said Margaret Mukahanana-Sangarwe (Zimbabwe) and Audun Rosland (Norway) will co-chair a contact group to develop conclusions on the GPG.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
